document_title: Flat warts: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
Doctors often diagnose warts in the following ways:
Clinical assessment: The doctor looks at the papules caused by flat warts, asks about symptoms, recent skin lesions encountered, contact history, etc. In addition, the doctor will scrape off a top layer of flat warts to check for common signs.; Biopsy: A small portion of the wart is removed by doctors for testing. The method helps eliminate suspicion of other dangerous diseases causing flat warts.
A Dermatologist - Skin Aesthetician diagnosed flat warts on the hand
